text:
If you're moving your website from squarespace to HubSpot, the best thing to do would be to rebuild the content with a theme so you can take full advantage of the CMS. 

Trying to move existing code is a nightmare on the backend and not user friendly on the front end.

crm objects should be fine. main concern with CMS on portal-to-portal is the content itself/pages. Pages can be exported as HTML, but page builds with the DND and theme attached cannot be moved over (though the theme and theme settings themselves can be moved)

therefore cms migrations from portal to portal are rather nuanced because there isn't a native way to move the content/pages itself. Objects, shouldn't be an issue.
